resources.title: CryBarEditor
resources.description: AoM Retold resource manager, BAR editor, modding tool.

resources.title: Modding AoMR for beginners
resources.description: This is a beginners guide for modding AoM Retold. This only includes the bare basics to start modding AoMR, so it is not a detailed guide for more advanced modding.
resources.author: Stavrozium

resources.title: AoMR-TutorialCampaign
resources.description: Recreation of the original AoM Tutorial for AoM Retold. While also being a Tutorial on creating a campaign and including templates and instructions for creating your own campaign.
resources.author: Skrylas

resources.title: AOM Retold Triggers
resources.description: A collection of AoM Retold video tutorials on triggers creation.

resources.title: Advanced Trigger Tutorials
resources.description: A collection of AoM Retold video tutorials on advanced triggers creation.

resources.title: Modding AOM
resources.description: A collection of AoM Retold video tutorials by the author of the Aztecs mod for Age of Mythology EE.
resources.author: ModdingAOM

resources.title: AoM:R Replay Tool
resources.description: Age of Mythology: Retold replay tool for analyzing and editing replays.

resources.title: AoM:R Replay Parser
resources.description: Age of Mythology: Retold replay parser, restoring inscrutiable binary to human readable formats.

resources.title: TMMViewer
